cards.question: In what year was Sega Genesis released in North America?
cards.hint: It's the same year George H.W. Bush took office as President

cards.question: Which videogame takes place in a dystopian underwater city called Rapture?
cards.hint: The game was inspired by Ayn Rand's "Atlas Shrugged"

cards.question: What Nintendo system was released after the N64 and before the Wii?
cards.hint: Its name comes from a symmetrical three-dimensional shape

cards.question: What character do you play as in The Legend Of Zelda?
What classic beat-'em-up game featured brothers Billy Lee and Jimmy (also nicknamed Spike and Hammer)?
cards.hint: Its name sounds like the name of a Chinese buffet restuarant
